text: Yautja are fictional aliens created by Jim E. Thomas, John Thomas, John McTiernan, and Stan Winston made for the Predator and Alien vs. Predator franchises starting in 1987. Notable members include Wolf, introduced in AVPR: Aliens vs. Predator – Requiem. ==Portrayal== The Yautja Wolf was voiced by Matthew Charles Santoro and played by Ian Whyte and Ian Feuer, in AVPR: Aliens vs. Predator – Requiem. The Yautja's vocal effects were provided by Dee Bradley Baker for Mortal Kombat X. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1987
title: Yautja
